#include <stdio.h>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

int n;
int a[230997];

bool maximize(int &a, int b){ if (a<b) a=b; else return false; return true; }

int query(int p){
    int ll=1, rr=n, mm, r=0, i;

    for (i=20; i>=0; i--)
    if ((1<<i)&p) {
        mm=lower_bound(a+ll, a+rr+1, 1<<i)-a;
        if (mm>ll) rr=mm-1;
    }
    else {
        mm=lower_bound(a+ll, a+rr+1, 1<<i)-a;
        if (mm<=rr) ll=mm;
    }

    for (i=ll; i<=rr; i++)
    maximize(r, a[i] ^ p);
    return r;
}

main(){
    int i, m, p;
    //freopen("input", "r", stdin);
    scanf("%d", &n);
    for (i=1; i<=n; i++)
    scanf("%d", &a[i]);
    sort(a+1, a+1+n);

    scanf("%d", &m);
    while (m--){
        scanf("%d", &p);
        printf("%d\n", query(p));
    }
}
